ygData.subject: RE: Questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: So, I really have been reading these posts and I m sure these questions have been answered but........... I m just starting to group up with more than two
ygData.messageBody:
So, I really have been reading these posts and I'm sure these questions have
been answered but...........

I'm just starting to group up with more than two people with my Bard. What
songs are the best to do? I've been using buff song plus hymn for the most
part....and do most people use their weapons or instruments at my level
(20)... I do have a claw and a harpoon from Kedge so I do quite a bit of
damage if I'm fighting...

Thanks :)

Tani 20th Bard (leveled last night!)
Halana 50th Shaman
Solusek Ro


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
